description:
Goro accidentally bought two tickets for his favorite idol Iyo`s concert, so he invites Koki along. After learning that Koki has become a KamiErabi God candidate in Tatsuya`s place, Goro ends up running into Iyo in a men`s bathroom just prior to the show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Form, Voice, Memories, and Even the Pain
Sugata mo, Koe mo, Kioku mo, Sono Itami made
姿も, 声も, 記憶も, その痛みまで
